description: The ListBonusPayments operation retrieves the amounts of bonuses you have paid to Workers for a given HIT or assignment.

nested_items.name: NumResults
nested_items.description: The number of bonus payments on this page in the filtered results list, equivalent to the number of bonus payments being returned by this call.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was incomplete (because there is more data to retrieve), Amazon Mechanical Turk returns a pagination token in the response. You can use this pagination token to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: BonusPayments
nested_items.description: A successful request to the ListBonusPayments operation returns a list of BonusPayment objects.

nested_items.name: WorkerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Worker to whom the bonus was paid.

nested_items.name: BonusAmount
nested_items.description: A string representing a currency amount.

nested_items.name: AssignmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the assignment associated with this bonus payment.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The Reason text given when the bonus was granted, if any.

nested_items.name: GrantTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the bonus was granted.
